response:
"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass es eine "data privacy" gibt, wenn unsere persönlichen informationen auf social media-plattformen, in online-shops und bei unseren smartphones permanent gespeichert werden? es ist zeit, dass wir uns für die protektion unserer daten einsetzen und nicht länger naiv sind. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "how can we still talk about data privacy when our personal information is permanently stored on social media platforms, online shops, and smartphones? it's time for us to take action and protect our data. #dataprotection #privacy #security"

in this post, i'm expressing my concern about the lack of data privacy in today's digital age. i'm questioning how we can still believe that our personal information is protected when it's constantly being collected, stored, and shared by various companies and organizations. i'm using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) to reach a wider audience and make my post more discoverable by people interested in this topic.
